name: Ch.4BaseConvo1
_source: speak;Eirika;Pardon me? I'm... not sure we have ever met before?
speak;Anna;Oh, dear.|Didn't my sister tell you about me coming?
speak;Eirika;I'm sorry, but you must have mistaken me with someone else.
speak;Anna;You're Princess Eirika correct?|My sister told me how much of a help you were in Elyos!
speak;Eirika;... How do you know who I am?
speak;Eirika;You're not with Grado, are you?|Or an assassin!

speak;Anna;Ack!|I'm no assassin, and I'm certainly no soldier!|There must have been some misunderstanding...|I'm a traveling merchant that was hoping to set up shop in Magvel.|But I guess I must be in the wrong Magvel...

speak;Anna;Er...Umm...|Forget I said that.|Here, take this and just... forget this whole conversation happened.|For some reason, it's just never worked for me.|But maybe it works for this world's inhabitants?|If so, maybe I can actually sell this junk.
speak;Anna;Er...|Ok, I better go now!|Bye bye!
